item.description:
👤 Owner: fweak1337

📝 Repository: fweak1337/Discord-QR-Token-Grabber

📄 Descrizione: This tool acts as a fake Discord verification bot that tricks users into scanning a real-looking QR code linked to Discord’s login system. Once scanned, it silently grabs and decrypts the user’s token.
